summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Paul Morris regarding an update on asset transfers related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial. It discusses the status of medallion stamping and the timing for sending out confirmations about asset movements.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as having requested to hold off on Southern Financial until confirmation of asset transfers.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating the transfer of assets related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial.
Harry has requested to delay actions regarding Southern Financial until asset confirmations are received.
The originals of certain documents are being medallion stamped and will be sent via FedEx.
